entry.title: Thursday: Drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to drizzle this morning and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
